jenes.utils.multitasking

Class MultiThreadRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.utils.multitasking.Runner
      • jenes.utils.multitasking.MultiThreadRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiThreadEvaluator

    public abstract class MultiThreadRunner
extends Runner
    This class provide the basic implementation of a multi-thread enviroinment for GeneticAlgorithm
    Since:
    2.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiThreadRunner

        public MultiThreadRunner()
        Default constructor. This will instantiate a MultiThreadRunner envoiroinment wich thread number is equals to the maximum number of processor phisical avaible to the host Java Virtual Machine.
        This approach minimize the overhead in managing the thread because the latest JVMs could try to dispach each thread on a different phisical processor obtaining the best speed-up in performances.
        See Also:
        MultiThreadRunner(int), Runtime.availableProcessors()

      • MultiThreadRunner

        public MultiThreadRunner(int nthreads)
        This will instantiate a MultiThreadRunner enviroinment with a fixed thread pool sized as defined by argument
        Parameters:
        nthreads - the number of threads to use to parallelize algorithm execution
